Package com.Connectify.controller

Class FeedController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.Connectify.controller.FeedController
  • @Controller
@RequestMapping("/feed")
public class FeedController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller class for handling requests related to the feed page.

    tasakos

      • showFeed

        @GetMapping
public java.lang.String showFeed​(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                 java.security.Principal principal,
                                 @RequestParam(value="errorMessage",required=false)
                                 java.lang.String errorMessage)
        Displays the feed page with posts, user's own posts, and followers.
        Parameters:
        model - the model to be populated with data for the view
        principal - the authenticated user principal
        errorMessage - optional error message to display
        Returns:
        the view name to display ("feed")
